title: LeagueClient.exe application error
body:
Guys I need help whenever I try to open the game I get 0xc0000005 error 

any solution?

thanks in advance

replies.body: Ah there it is, thanks.  :D  This is likely caused by an overzealous security setting that's struggling to access files.  Run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide which should fix this up.
Might you please just send me the "LeagueClient.exe"

Hey there, there is no standalone files that can be downloaded.  You can use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a reinstall which can get you fixed up.  You'll still want to go over the permissions guide to make sure your pc settings are allowing your files to be read.  It might not be missing, just blocked.
